Cardiology

Our Cardiology Department focuses on the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of heart and blood vessel conditions. We aim to help patients achieve optimal cardiovascular health through early detection and personalized care.

Heart Conditions We Treat

  • Hypertension (High Blood Pressure)
  • Coronary Artery Disease
  • Heart Arrhythmias
  • Heart Failure
  • Cholesterol Management
  • Preventive Cardiology
Healthy heart, healthy life: Regular check-ups and lifestyle adjustments can significantly reduce the risk of cardiovascular disease.

Diagnostic and Preventive Services

Our cardiology services include ECG, echocardiogram, stress testing, and cholesterol screening. We also provide lifestyle counseling for diet, exercise, and smoking cessation.

When to See a Cardiologist

Visit a cardiologist if you experience chest pain, shortness of breath, dizziness, irregular heartbeat, or a family history of heart disease. Early diagnosis saves lives.
